column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I wanted to visit my family that lived far away for Christmas .
#id=2
#text=I knew that it was too far for me to drive , so I decided to fly .
#id=3
#text=I went online and searched for tickets .
#id=4
#text=I found a ticket that was the cheapest with the fewest layovers , because I wanted to spend as little time as possible traveling on my trip to my family 's house .
#id=5
#text=I brought my ticket to the airport on the day that I was to depart .
#id=6
#text=I went to the gate of the airline that I was flying and handed in my ticket .
#id=7
#text=I waited in the airport until the plane was ready to be boarded .
#id=8
#text=I got in line and boarded the plane .
#id=9
#text=I found a seat and buckled my seat belt .
#text=It took a couple hours of flying until we landed .
#text=I got off of the plane and met up with my family in the airport .
